title: The world's first breast milk monitor was a big hit for parents at CES 2026 - here's how it works
contentSnippet: The Coro is a nipple shield equipped with a tiny sensor that accurately measures the amount of breast milk a baby receives during a feeding. It won the Best of CES award for parent tech.
content: The Coro is a nipple shield equipped with a tiny sensor that accurately measures the amount of breast milk a baby receives during a feeding. It won the Best of CES award for parent tech.
